Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.game.tools

Class JsonConverter

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.game.tools.JsonConverter
public class JsonConverter extends Object
The JsonConverter class provides methods for converting game objects to and from JSON format.

    • objectToJSON

      public String objectToJSON(CardInterface card) throws JsonException
      Converts a CardInterface object to its JSON representation.
      Parameters:
      card - the CardInterface object to be converted
      Returns:
      the JSON representation of the card
      Throws:
      JsonException - if the provided card object is null or if the card representation is invalid

      Converts a Board object to its JSON representation.
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object to be converted
      Returns:
      the JSON representation of the board
      Throws:
      JsonException - if the provided board object is null

    • JSONToBoard

      public Board JSONToBoard(String stringInput) throws JsonException, SyntaxException
      Converts a JSON string representation of a board to a Board object.
      Parameters:
      stringInput - the JSON string representing the board
      Returns:
      the Board object created from the JSON input
      Throws:
      JsonException - if there is an issue parsing the JSON input
      SyntaxException - if there is a syntax error in the JSON input

    • JSONToObject

      public JsonConvertable JSONToObject(String stringInput) throws JsonException, SyntaxException
      Converts a JSON string representation of an object to a JsonConvertable object.
      Parameters:
      stringInput - the JSON string representing the object
      Returns:
      the JsonConvertable object created from the JSON input
      Throws:
      JsonException - if there is an issue parsing the JSON input
      SyntaxException - if there is a syntax error in the JSON input

    • JSONToDeck

      public Deck JSONToDeck(Character character) throws SyntaxException, FileNotFoundException
      Converts a JSON representation of a deck into a Deck object for a specific character.
      Parameters:
      character - the character associated with the deck
      Returns:
      the Deck object created from the JSON input
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if there is a syntax error in the JSON input
      FileNotFoundException - if the JSON file is not found
